subject: New assembly competition: $5,400 in prizes!
body:
Hello sm1lies,

A new Assembly Contest is now open for registration, with total prizes of $5,400. The Hygeia mobile application allows nursing professionals to manage scheduled shifts as well as bid on available shifts through portable devices. The components for this application are currently in development through the TopCoder, Inc. component competitions. A bonus is offered for integrating these components in place of the stubs required for this competition.

The winning team will be paid $3,000, and the second place team will be paid $1,500. 

More details are available here: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ProjectDetail&pj=30001462

Assembly Competitions are team-based competitions to integrate completed components from the TopCoder catalog into full-blown applications. If you are interested in joining either a team or the review board, or would like more information on the competition process, send us an email at AssemblyCompetitions@topcoder.com.
Good luck!

- The TopCoder Software Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of new TopCoder development opportunities.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
